attributes.action: advise the Speaker that the term "Honourable Member" shall henceforward be deemed an Unparliamentary Expression.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To reflect the diminished status of MPs following their apparent inability to regulate their own behaviour, vis a vis expense claims and other matters.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
